term: Why were the French angry and what did they do to us?
content:
involved the french
federalists were pro-british and didn’t really like the french
the French were angry - we backed out from the franco-american alliance and they were mad and thought we violated that alliance by the fact that we had signed jay’s treaty
they also began seizing our ships in british waters
	the british were doing this to us in french waters, and now the french is doing it to us in british waters
